room_title: Escape room "The Dame Disappears" by Great Scott Mystery Rooms in Hartford
room_description: That famous female British mystery novelist has vanished and left a letter suggesting that her broken heart has driven her to take drastic action. Scotland Yard has called in your team of master detectives to examine clues left behind in her bedroom, and determine whether her disappearance is truly a cry for help, a stunt created to sell more books, or a sign of foul play. You have one hour to find out where she went and resolve any of her unfinished business.
